explains: adj. 无限的；基础深厚的

sentences.en: Recent Indians who were more familiar with broad-based, interior-maritime adaptation, intensified this strategy to cope with the Dorset.
sentences.cn: 近代印度人更熟悉广泛的内海适应性，加强了应对多塞特郡的战略。

sentences.en: For this is a broad-based mess.
sentences.cn: 因为这是一个广泛的混乱。
但是这种回升的基础是广泛的。
